title: A Universal Disentangling Formula for Coherent States of Perelomov's Type
abstract: A universal disentangling formula (such as the Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff one) for coherent states of Perelomov's type ($ |z \ra = \exp (z\Adag -\bar{z}A) |0 \ra $) which are defined for generalized oscillator algebras is given.
